name: To Grandma's House
description:
To Granma's House is a multi level 2D game, designed and built by our 1st year Games Design students.

The Game is part of a Educational Brief which askes the students to design and make a Game to an age group ranging from 4 to 8 years of age. The game should have learning objectives appropriate to the age within Numeracy and Literacy.

This was their final project of the year and is the culmination of the skills they learn in their first year of Game Design at Priestley College.
